metadata.title: CVE-2018-10893 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple integer overflow and buffer overflow issues were discovered inspice-client's handling of LZ compressed frames. A malicious server couldcause the client to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: spice-gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
